reviews.review: The game is fine. But portal 2 is WAY better
This game is a legend, and a must own on this store

my wife promised cake on my big boi birth day she didnt deliver so i didnt deliver her spine.

after my first degree murder cops came to check on her so i did a backwards bunny hop and bypassed the collision of my window and found a plank of would as expected i repeatedly jumped on the plank and now i live under a bridge eating mcdonnies
Excelentes puzzles, excelente trama, excelentes personajes, excelente ambientación y entre otras cosas excelentes. Muy recomendado.
These points of data make a beautiful line- we're out of Beta, we're releasing on time! So I'm glad I got burned, think of all the things we learned for the people who are still alive.
its a classic with hours of great, challenging puzzles. buy it.

This game is a classic, and absolutely worth your money. That said, you should still wait for the sale, it happens often and the % of the discount is always high. Just leave it on your wishlist, but if you are seeing this cuz it's on sale, just buy it.

Now for the part that matters. It's an awesome game. The puzzles are fun and challenging. The villain is really well written, what gives some story to the game. Plus it has a track by Jonathan coulton, "still alive", what is just great.

Also the meme "The cake is a Lie!".

Ps: you should get portal 2 too.

Yes times A MILLION this was my dream to have this game, this was my third game on steam. Enough about me let me tell you why you should get this everyone likes portals.. right? anyway alot of people might like portals then this would be the game for you also the physics are great......... (PHYSICS GO BRRRRRRRR) Enough about physics. portals, energy balls, turrets, developer console, momentum, cubes on buttons, very perfect physics. You need to at least try this game. Physics part: Okay yes physics are dumb due to that i learned that i could abh ash and afh this is a bug that makes you go very very fast when i learned to do that i did some speedrunning and got good time (i didnt have a timer i just speedrun) get game......... n o w.
Its Portal. You know what you are getting
So fun! I love sciencey games and this a a sciencey game. I love this game a lot! Would recommend to science lovers =)
i like this game and all but it would be better if you bought it
Крутая игра для повышения iq аххахаахха ну ладно рофл, отличная игра и очень интересная
masterpiece of art the best game in existence
之前玩的盗版，利用的控制台就只有37分钟直接通关了
Love the game, good story and good gameplay. I recommend this game.
Very good game, even though its probably older than me

Bad: Short, some solutions are "duh!"
Good: The rest, Funny, Witty, Great Story, Great Ending, finished twice, may try for a third time in a few years, Timeless
Score: 9/10
An absolute masterclass in game design.
Un gran clásico de los puzzles, con una historia envolvente a pesar de su sencillez. Cien por ciento recomendado.
Me encanta, su historia, sus soundtracks, sus logros y la dificultad de los mismos, extremadamente desafiantes

the fact that both portal 1 and 2 costs ONLY 3 CANADIAN DOLLARS ON A BUNDLE SALE IS CRIMINAL.


no excuse for not buying this game, it's as cheap as it gets
First time I ever played this game, and like most valve games it was marvelous, couldn't recommend more

Thinking about those still alive!!
"Du du du du du"

It took me only 2 hours to complete the game but damn that was good and to compare with Portal 2's atmosphere of emptiness and that the facility is abandoned in Portal 1 I felt more empitness and a feeling that someon's watching me while citatel's ambience from hl2 was playing on
esta bueno lo malo es que es un poco corto

Deneyim ettiğim en iyi oyunlardan birisi. Bulmacaları oradan oraya ışınlanarak çözmek insana "Ben de amma zekiyim haa!!" dedirttiriyor. Kötü yanları doğru düzgün bir senaryosu olmayıp oyunun çok kısa olması. Fakat kanaatimce bu oyuna kısa bir deneyim demek pek de yanlış olmaz.

Güzel ve eğlenceli oyun tavsiye üzerine aldım ve oynadım. Kullanıma çok kolay adapte oldum. Bu silahtan benimde olsa keşke kaçmak istediğim yerlerden kurtulsam, veya yerimden kalmadan mutfaktan yiyecek bir şeyler alsam ne güzel olurdu... Oyunu indirim deyken almanızı öneriyorum. Şimdi Portal 2'yi oynayacağım.
Very simple, yet effective game. Plus the song slapps.
ive been waiting to get this game for the longest time and finally got it yesterday. LOVE IT!
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction
Fun puzzle solving game combined with FPS. Wish there was more.
Great Story. I say get and play this game.

Immaginate di svegliarvi improvvisamente in una stanzina di vetro dove la voce metallica di Trenitalia vi dice di stare sereni, che andrà tutto bene, che siete parte di un esperimento e che alla fine di tutto ci sarà un fantastico ppparty con una splendida torta tutta per voi!
Meraviglioso!
Vi addentrerete così di portale in portale, di stanza in stanza, di enigma in enigma, di livello in livello accompagnati dalla suadente voce di Trenitalia-Glados.
Fino alla fine.
Alla stanza della torta.

... e allora coverete la vostra tremenda tremenda vendetta.
Perché non esiste cosa peggiore che promettere dei dolci ad una donna e poi dirle che sono finiti.

Pretty sure Portal was the first game I bought, if not the only one I remember buying as soon as I got steam and loving it. I have no words but amazing game. Check it out if you're interested in one great title.
Отличная игра, прошёл от А до Я, интересная голово-ломающая игра, советую всем, кому нравиться жанр головоломка.
Интересный сюжет, дополнительные уровни заставляют поработать мозгами. Кубик жалко. Иногда игра сохраняется прямо перед смертью. 9 тортиков из 10.
its kinda like that one fortnite update
Jogo incrível que coloca sua capacidade de solução de problemas em teste.
A legendary game to say the least. A short, fun game. It's very frustrating in some parts but it's a puzzle game so ofc it'll be frustrating.

Hra je super ale oproti druhému dílu to dobré není ale cháputo je to z roku 2007.
TRen kdo má rád Half Life tak by si měl zahrát Portal 1 a 2 (protože se hra odehrává ve stejném světě)
Great classic Portal! All the portals, puzzles, and snark that one could desire!
这种体验要我用文字来形容的话 那我只能说它是用电子游戏的方式所呈现出来的 真正的 游戏 不是什么急停定位开枪的操作党 不是什么反转剧情的看片党 不是什么获得装备的满足党 它是纯粹的游戏 就像我们小时候 打口袋 拔河 带来的是纯粹的快乐 更何况它还有不错的剧情 简直是锦上添花 必入游戏
why are you looking at bad reviews? JUST GET THE FRICKING GAME!
If you like puzzles and timed platforming, you might get a kick out of this game

jogo rápido, porém cativante com puzzles que te prendem e lore que te deixa curioso
